alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 20 at 3:30PM CST until February 22 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Fire Weather Watch for western Oklahoma Tuesday Afternoon... .Dry and gusty southwest winds are expected to develop Tuesday afternoon across western Oklahoma. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Weather Watch for parts of western Oklahoma, which is in effect Tuesday and Wednesday afternoons. * TIMING...Noon to 7 PM Tuesday and Wednesday. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Higher gusts are possible Wednesday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...72 to 78. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward
